data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 6 believers in the state of Demir Kapija.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Demir Kapija, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 6 believers find a person of peace today among the 3,295 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Demir Kapija that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Demir Kapija who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Demir Kapija, North Macedonia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 6 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Demir Kapija.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Demir Kapija, North Macedonia has a population of 3,300.

We estimate Demir Kapija has 6 people who might know Jesus, 2,040 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,255 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 550 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Demir Kapija. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.
